briefTitle: Effectiveness of Peer Support on Quality of Life in Recently Diagnosed Breast Cancer Patients
officialTitle: Effectiveness of Peer Support on Quality of Life in Recently Diagnosed Breast Cancer Patients - a Randomized Trial
primaryOutcomeMeasure: A change of health-related quality of life (HRQoL).
eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* recently diagnosed primary breast cancer
* no other serious illnesses
* ability to communicate in Finnish or Swedish (official languages in Finland)
* ability to fill in the questionnaires

Exclusion Criteria:

* some other serious illnesses
* inability to communicate in Finnish or Swedish (official languages in Finland)
* inability to fill in the questionnaires
